about_the_game:
Colorful yet edgy, this is the fourth iteration on a series of monster packs of unique creatures -- all with inventive, meaningful variations that add versatility and depth to your game design possibilities.

From witches to scarecrows to contorted mutations of humans, this new pack doubles down the series' horror tinges, while remaining playful in presentation.

As with every Seraph Circle monster pack, all enemies contain unique variations and are delivered in both PNG and PSD formats. This allows you to take the variations and change them even further! Make your game your own!

Contents:

* Standard and Hi-Res versions of all 16 Monsters with variations
* Total of 66 monster battler graphics
* png and psd files included
